## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)

## Checklist

- [ ] I have run `bun run format` and `bun run lint`.
- [ ] Type check passes (`bun check` where applicable).
- [ ] Tests pass (`bun run test`).
